banner.title: About Us
banner.subtitle: Measure the power of your love with our test.

firstSection.title: Is There a Formula to Measure Love?
firstSection.desc: We think so! BlindLover is here to help you find answers to the questions you’re curious about regarding your relationship or your crush. Whether you test your love for your partner or discover your crush’s interest in you, BlindLover offers you a fun journey.
firstSection.desc_two: Our tests analyze your answers with the power of AI and present results tailored for you. Your percentage love score is delivered along with fun comments. We’re designed for those who want to evaluate relationships in a fun and interactive way!

secondSection.title: What Do We Offer?
secondSection.first: Fun and Personalized Tests: Enjoy discovering your love percentage with questions tailored just for you.
secondSection.second: AI-Powered Analysis: We analyze your answers to provide you with the most accurate results.
secondSection.third: Mobile and Web Access: Participate in tests easily via both the app and web.
secondSection.fourth: Suitable for All Ages and Situations: A young relationship, a long-term bond, or perhaps just a crush? We’re ready for all.

thirdSection.title: Discover BlindLover!
thirdSection.desc: To test your love, have some fun, and perhaps learn more about your relationship, BlindLover is the right place. Answer the questions, get your results, and discover the level of love in your life. Remember, every love is a journey, but we make this journey much more fun!

fourthSection.title: How Much Does They Love You?

CookieConsent.title: This website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience.

CookiePage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePage.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how cookies are used when you visit the BlindLover website <Link>(https://blindlover.com)</Link>. Our purpose in using cookies is to provide you with the best user experience and continuously improve our services.
CookiePage.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small data files placed on your device when you visit a website. These files are stored by your browser and allow the website to recognize you, remember your preferences, and enhance your user experience.

cookiesWeUse.description1: These cookies are necessary for the basic functions of our website. For example, enabling you to log in or remembering your language preferences.
cookiesWeUse.description2: These cookies help us understand how our website is used. This information is utilized to make improvements to our website.
cookiesWeUse.description3: These cookies remember your preferences (e.g., language or regional settings) and provide you with a more personalized experience.
cookiesWeUse.description4: These cookies are used to display ads relevant to your interests and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

CookiePage.manageCookies: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may cause some parts of our website to function improperly.
CookiePage.thirdPartyCookies: BlindLover may use third-party cookies for certain services. These cookies may be used for analytics and advertising purposes. The management of third-party cookies is subject to the respective provider's policies.
CookiePage.cookiesRetention: The duration of cookies stored on your device may vary. Temporary cookies are deleted when you close your browser, while persistent cookies remain on your device for a specified period.
CookiePage.changes: This policy may be updated from time to time. When updates are made, the new policy will be published on our website.
CookiePage.moreInfo: If you would like more information about our cookie policy, please contact us:

banner.subtitle: Do you want to find out how strong your relationship is or measure the interest of the person you like? Discover our fun-filled test now and learn your love percentage!

banner1.subtitle: With AI-powered analyses based on the RIASEC, MBTI, and KOLB scientific models, Discover your personality and reach your dream profession.

banner2.subtitle: Get ready for relationship tips, romantic movie and series lists, and fun content to spice up your love life! Discover new articles and make your love even more exciting!
banner2.title: Blindlover Blog: Where Love and Fun Meet!

NotApprovedPage.title: Please Verify
NotApprovedPage.desc: We noticed that your account has not been verified. Please verify your account by clicking the link we sent to your email.

PanelPage.title: Discover Compatibility
PanelPage.subtitle: Are You Ready to Find Out How Strong Your Bond Is?
PanelPage.desc: This test is designed to help you explore the compatibility between you and the person in mind! Featuring 5 categories: General Relationship Status, Emotional Connection, Loyalty and Trust, Romantic Gestures, Fun and Daily Habits, this fun test consists of 50 questions that will help you understand the depth of your relationship. While answering the questions, consider your relationship with the person in mind. The results will reveal your compatibility level and highlight the strengths of your relationship. If you're ready, take this test to uncover the dynamics between you and map out your relationship. Who knows, this journey might bring you even closer together!
PanelPage.info_desc: To start the test, you need to fill out the questions in the Relationship Details section of your profile. Please complete this information first.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At BlindLover, your privacy is of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we process and protect the information collected through the  <Link>https://blindlover.com</Link> website and mobile application. By using BlindLover, you agree to this policy.
PrivacyPage.section1Content: When you use BlindLover, we may collect the following information:

section1List.one: Personal Information: Name, email address (if provided during registration).
section1List.two: User Responses: Answers you provide during tests.
section1List.three: Device Information: IP address, device type, operating system, and browser information.
section1List.four: Usage Data: Features you use and how you interact with our website or application.

PrivacyPage.section2Title: 2. How Do We Use the Information?
PrivacyPage.section2Content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

section2List.one: To analyze your test results and provide personalized feedback.
section2List.two: To improve our services and enhance user experience.
section2List.three: To make our website and application more efficient.
section2List.four: To offer new features based on your feedback.

PrivacyPage.section3Content: BlindLover uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your user experience. Cookies are small data files stored on your device.

section3List.one: Essential Cookies: Used to provide basic functionality of the website.
section3List.two: Performance Cookies: Used to analyze usage data.
section3List.three: Advertising Cookies: Used to show ads tailored to your interests.

PrivacyPage.section3Note: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.
PrivacyPage.section4Title: 4. Who Do We Share Your Information With?
PrivacyPage.section4Content: We may share your information with third parties in the following cases:

section4List.one: Service Providers: We may work with third parties to analyze data, host services, and provide technical support.
section4List.two: Legal Obligations: We may share your information with relevant authorities when legally required.
section4List.three: Advertising Partners: We may share anonymized data to provide ads tailored to your interests.

PrivacyPage.section5Title: 5. How Do We Protect Your Information?
PrivacyPage.section5Content: We take industry-standard technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal information. However, we cannot guarantee complete security for data transmitted over the internet.
PrivacyPage.section6Content: Your personal information is retained only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes specified. User accounts or data can be deleted upon request.
PrivacyPage.section7Content: As a BlindLover user, you have the following rights:

section7List.one: Right of Access: You can learn which information we hold about you.
section7List.two: Right to Rectification: You can correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
section7List.three: Right to Erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal information.
section7List.four: Right to Object: You can object to the processing of your data.

PrivacyPage.section7Note: To exercise your rights, please contact us at hello@blindlover.com.
PrivacyPage.section8Content: BlindLover may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When updates are made, the new policy will be published on our website.
PrivacyPage.section9Content:
If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:
Email: hello@blindlover.com
PrivacyPage.closing: Thank you for using BlindLover. Protecting your data and respecting your privacy is our priority.

TermsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsPage.intro: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the BlindLover website (https://blindlover.com) and its services. Please read these terms carefully before using our website and application. By using BlindLover, you declare that you accept these terms.
TermsPage.section1Content: BlindLover is a platform that offers fun tests and analyses related to relationships. Our services provide results based on user responses and are intended for entertainment purposes only. The content provided does not constitute definite information and is only meant to serve as guidance in your decision-making processes.

section2Content.one: You are over 14 years old, or if you are under 14, you have parental consent.
section2Content.two: You agree to use our services in compliance with the law.
section2Content.three: You commit to avoiding misuse that could negatively affect the experiences of other users.

TermsPage.section3Content: BlindLover places great importance on user privacy. Your data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy. For more details on how your data is used, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
TermsPage.section4Content: All content, designs, logos, and materials on our website and application belong to BlindLover. These contents cannot be copied, reproduced, or used in any other manner without authorization.
TermsPage.section5Content: BlindLover does not guarantee the accuracy or suitability of the test results provided. These results are purely for entertainment purposes and should not be relied upon solely in decision-making processes. BlindLover is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the results.
TermsPage.section6Content: BlindLover may include third-party links to enhance user experience. However, we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these third-party sites. Please review their respective policies before using these links.
TermsPage.section7Content: BlindLover reserves the right to update these terms at any time. When updates are made, the new terms will be published on our website. By continuing to use our services, you agree to the updated terms.
TermsPage.section8Content: For any questions regarding the Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
